entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Estevan Point
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain. Temperature steady near plus 5.
entry.summary: Rain. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 except 60 gusting to 80 over exposed coastal sections late this evening and overnight. Temperature steady near plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain. High 9.
entry.summary: Rain ending in the morning then cloudy. Rain at times heavy beginning in the afternoon. Amount 10 mm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 70 gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections in the morning and early in the afternoon. Wind becoming southeast 50 gusting to 70 in the afternoon. High 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Showers at times heavy. Temperature steady near 6.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy with risk of a thunderstorm. Amount 15 to 25 mm except 40 mm near Zeballos and Tahsis. Wind southeast 50 km/h gusting to 70 except gusting to 90 over exposed coastal sections early in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 early in the evening. Temperature steady near 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 08 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Showers. High 7.
entry.summary: Showers. Windy. High 7. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 08 February 2023
